 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחַט‎</span> **verb** ==slaughter, beat== (originally ***beat, flay***? compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ša—â‰u***</u></abbr>, ***flay***, ***take off*** dress; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slay*** (but <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—***</u></abbr>; is this loan-word in Arabic ?); Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew, especially in ritual); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Jer.39.6|Jer 39:6]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּשְׁחָטוֺ‎</span> consecutive [[Lev.3.2|Lev 3:2]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁחַט‎</span> [[Lev.4.24|Lev 4:24]] +, 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּשְׁחֲטִי‎</span> [[Ezek.16.21|Ezek 16:21]], 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁחָט֫וּהוּ‎</span> [[Judg.12.6|Judg 12:6]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחֲטוּ‎</span> [[Exod.12.21|Exod 12:21]]; [[2Chr.35.6|2Chr 35:6]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחֹט‎</span> [[Isa.22.13|Isa 22:13]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁחֹט‎</span> [[Gen.22.10|Gen 22:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺט‎</span>- [[Ezek.40.39|Ezek 40:39]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחֲטָם‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:64a»§ 64a</sup>) [[Ezek.23.39|Ezek 23:39]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺחֵט‎</span> [[Isa.66.3|Isa 66:3]], etc.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחוּט‎</span> [[1Kgs.10.16|1Kgs 10:16]] +, etc.; — ***slaughter:*** 

**1.** beast for food [[1Sam.14.32|1Sam 14:32]]; [[1Sam.14.34|1Sam 14:34]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.22.13|Isa 22:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרַג‎</span>), compare [[Lev.17.3|Lev 17:3]] (twice in verse), for blood [[Gen.37.31|Gen 37:31]] ([[BDB#E|E]]). 

**2.** usually (51 t.; Hexateuch only [[BDB#P|P]], 38 t.) technical term of ***killing*** sacrifice (BJacob<sup>ZAW xvii (1897), 5i</sup>), [[1Sam.1.25|1Sam 1:25]]; [[Exod.29.11|Exod 29:11]]; [[Lev.1.5|Lev 1:5]]; [[Lev.1.11|Lev 1:11]]; [[Lev.4.24|Lev 4:24]]; [[Lev.9.8|Lev 9:8]]; [[Num.19.3|Num 19:3]]; [[2Chr.29.22|2Chr 29:22]] (twice in verse); [[2Chr.29.24|2Chr 29:24]] +; absolute [[Ezek.40.41|Ezek 40:41]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location); bird [[Lev.14.5|Lev 14:5]]; [[Lev.14.6|Lev 14:6]]; [[Lev.14.50|Lev 14:50]]; [[Lev.14.51|Lev 14:51]] beast in illicit sacrifice [[Isa.66.3|Isa 66:3]] with accusative of sacrifice (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺלָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשָׁם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַטָאת‎</span>, etc.) [[Ezek.40.39|Ezek 40:39]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location), v[[Ezek.40.42|Ezek 40:42]]; [[Ezek.44.11|Ezek 44:11]]; [[Lev.4.24|Lev 4:24]]; [[Lev.7.2|Lev 7:2]]; [[Lev.14.13|Lev 14:13]] +; passover lamb [[Exod.12.6|Exod 12:6]], accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפֶּסַח‎</span> v[[Exod.12.21|Exod 12:21]]; [[2Chr.30.15|2Chr 30:15]]; [[2Chr.35.1|2Chr 35:1]]; [[2Chr.35.6|2Chr 35:6]]; [[2Chr.35.11|2Chr 35:11]]; [[Ezra.6.20|Ezra 6:20]]. 

**3.** ***slaughter*** person [[Judg.12.6|Judg 12:6]]; [[1Kgs.18.40|1Kgs 18:40]]; [[2Kgs.10.7|2Kgs 10:7]]; [[2Kgs.10.14|2Kgs 10:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location), [[2Kgs.25.7|2Kgs 25:7]] = [[Jer.39.6|Jer 39:6]]a = [[Jer.52.10|Jer 52:10]]a, [[Jer.39.6|Jer 39:6]]b =  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject [[Num.14.16|Num 14:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); in human sacrifice [[Gen.22.10|Gen 22:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), to false gods [[Ezek.16.21|Ezek 16:21]]; [[Ezek.23.39|Ezek 23:39]]; [[Isa.57.5|Isa 57:5]]. 

**4.** passive participle = ***beaten, hammered***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָהָב שָׁחוּט‎</span> [[1Kgs.10.16|1Kgs 10:16]]; [[1Kgs.10.17|1Kgs 10:17]] = [[2Chr.9.15|2Chr 9:15]]a [[2Chr.9.16|2Chr 9:16]], of shekels [[2Chr.9.15|2Chr 9:15]] so also [[Jer.9.7|Jer 9:7]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵץשָׁחוּט‎</span> (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺחֵט‎</span>) ***hammered*** (i.e. sharpened) ***arrow***. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁחֵט‎</span> [[Num.11.22|Num 11:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***be slaughtered*** for food (subject beast); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשָּׁחֵט‎</span> [[Lev.6.18|Lev 6:18]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***be slain***, of sacrifice. 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁחֲטָה‎</span> **noun feminine** (**Qal** ***Infinitive construct*** [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 263</sup>) doubtful word; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂטִים הֶעְמִיקוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> [[Hos.5.2|Hos 5:2]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] (compare [[BDB#AV|AV]]) ***the revolters are gone deep in slaughtering*** ['Opferschlächterei' [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 590, n. 1</sup>], [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] (formerly), [[BDB#Che|Che]] ***in corrupting*** (read then <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחֲתָה‎</span>); [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחַת הַשִּׁטִּים‎</span> ***have made deep the pit of Shittim*** (as place of idolatry). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁחִין‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁחן‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁחִיף‎</span> see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂחִיף‎</span>]. below,  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחִיס‎</span> [[Isa.37.30|Isa 37:30]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחִישׁ‎</span> (in \|\| [[2Kgs.19.29|2Kgs 19:29]]), q. v.
